title: Build Notes
content:
Build Notes - ppPage Development

Latest Updates (Build 475e44c - Jan 30, 2025)

  • Fixed theme switching issues - Light theme and custom themes now properly update menu and text backgrounds
  • Removed build number display - Simplified taskbar by removing build counter and update buttons
  • Fixed menu spam issue - Projects submenu no longer recreates on every hover event
  • Improved Level 3 menu stability - Sub-submenus now only close when explicitly intended

Recent Features

  • Navigation Menu Improvements - Projects menu with stable sub-submenus
  • Theme System - Light, dark, and custom HSL themes with proper variable propagation
  • Menu Hierarchy - Level 1, 2, and 3 menu system with proper event handling
  • Cache Management - Automatic cache clearing on new builds

This post will be updated with each new build to track development progress.
